name: Line Runner
description:
Quickly jump over and roll through obstacles, as fast and as far as you can. Try to beat other players highscore on up to 10 different tracks.

- From the makers of Stickman Skate Battle, Stickman Basketball, Stickman Soccer, Stickman Base Jumper, Rope'n'Fly, Stickman Ice Hockey and many others
- More than 6 million addicted players can't be wrong!
- Featured by Apple as "Staff Favorite"

FEATURES:
- Very fast paced gameplay
- Really challenging
- Increasing difficulty from easy to bone breaking
- Game Center support
- Challenge your friends and all other players worldwide

Feel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as fast as possible.
Thank you very much for all your support and interest in our games! We would love to hear your suggestions.
